general.title_field_description: The title of the course should consist of keywords that demonstrate the value and topic of the course.
general.description_field_description: Describe your course, who can find it useful and what exactly students will learn.
general.checkbox_label: Will you provide a completion certificate?
general.checkbox_description: A certificate might be valuable for students

landing.subjects_field_description: Enter objectives or outcomes that learners can expect to achieve after completing your course.
landing.requirements_field_label: What are the requirements or prerequisites for taking your course?
landing.requirements_field_description: List the required skills, experience, tools or equipment learners should have prior to taking your course.
landing.describe-course_field_description: Tell us more about this course: what it covers, what it's worth, and why students take it.
landing.promo_video_description: Upload a short promo video where you can tell more about your course and get students interested in taking it.
landing.promo_image_description: The cover is the first thing a student will see when searching for courses, an informative and attractive cover for your course.

structure.lecture_quiz_info_message: Quizzes: Enter your question and select the correct answer by ticking the check mark
structure.dialog_modal_delete_lecture: Do you want to delete lecture?
structure.dialog_modal_delete_lesson: Do you want to delete lesson?

lecturer.fullname_field_description: The title of the course should consist of keywords that demonstrate the value and topic of the course.
lecturer.skills_field_description: Write the skills that the teacher has that are relevant to this course, for example: Middle Project Manager, Senior Javascript Developer.
lecturer.about_field_description: Tell more about the course lecturer

price.title: Pricing settings
price.info_box_text: According to our rules, the first section of your course must be available for free viewing so that students can get familiar with you and your lessons, this might increase the trust of the learners in your product.
price.dialog_modal_delete_promo_code: Do you want to delete promo code?

advertising.course_url_description: You can share your course on your social media using the link below
